frame.name: Fame
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is well-known among a wide range of people (in general or in a particular domain) for a particular <fen>Reason</fen>, which may be a behavior, characteristic, or some other associated item. In the case of events, fame entails a large number of people being aware of the event's occurence; in the case of concrete entities, including humans, fame entails awareness of existence. In both cases, often fame is accompanied by awareness of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s significance in historical, cultural, or social contexts.
<ex><fex name="Entity">Shakespeare</fex> <m>was</m> <t>famous</t> <fex name="Time">during his life</fex> <fex name="Explanation">because he performed in front of Queen Elizabeth I more than anyone else</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> which is widely known and recognized.
</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the degree of fame of the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> is considered famous.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>A state of affairs that provides an explanation (via reasoning, causation, etc.) for the level of fame of the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Reason
FE.definition:
<def-root>The behavior, attribute, or associated entities that provide the reason for the <fen>Entity</fen> being famous.
<ex>This station is <t>famous</t> <fex name="rea">for the many ramen shacks surrounding it</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Google is <t>well known</t> <fex name="rea">for having attracted and kept some of the best minds in the industry</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is famous.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is famous.
<ex>Certain people are <t>well known</t> <fex name="pla">only in North America</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes famous.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: famous.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: known about by many people.

lexUnit.name: fame.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the state of being famous.

lexUnit.name: stature.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: importance or reputation gained by ability or achievement.

lexUnit.name: legendary.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: remarkable enough to be famous; very well known.

lexUnit.name: infamous.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: well known for some bad quality or deed

lexUnit.name: renown.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the state of being famous.

lexUnit.name: renowned.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: famous, especially for widely appreciated acts.

lexUnit.name: notoriety.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state of being notorious

lexUnit.name: reputation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the opinion of others directed towards an Entity

lexUnit.name: epic.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: being known from (or hypothetically deserving of reference within) poetry of the epic tradition.
